meta.description: Calls for Proposals, Tech Conferences, and Speaking Tips
meta.author: Karl L. Hughes

data.name: NE RPC
data.description: NE RPC is a community-organised, free-to-attend virtual conference, showcasing speakers from the North East of England. We’ll be hosting a day of 30-minute talks, covering a wide variety of tech subjects. Whether bleeding-edge or tried-and-tested, we’re listening!

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: GIDS.LEAD DEV LIVE
relatedRecords.description: GIDS.LEAD Live is an online training event featuring a Conference day (Tue, 17th November) and Workshop days (Wed-Fri, 18-20th November).

relatedRecords.name: Webflow Virtual World Tour
relatedRecords.description: 3 weeks. 12 events. 9 time zones. August–September 2020. Take a trip around the world with the Webflow team, and hear from local customers and experts.

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Day India
relatedRecords.description: AWS Community Day India 2020 is being organized by AWS User Group India. We’re united by community-led learnings and diversified by the wide variety of tools and technologies closely knit with Amazon Web Services.

relatedRecords.name: Katherine Johnson Summit
relatedRecords.description: The mission of the Katherine Johnson Summit is to celebrate Black women in technology and provide a platform for us to learn, support, and uplift each other.
